previous_headings: 2. The principle of measuring spatial stratified heterogeneity based on information consistency
what: 2.1 When the dependent variable is a continuous variable:
title: Information Consistency-Based Measures for Spatial Stratified Heterogeneity
text: \[ I_{C}\left(d,s\right) = \sum_{s_{} \S}p\left(s_{}\right)\frac{ \arctan \left(\textbf{RelE} \left( f_{d_{}} \mid \mid  f \right) \right)}{\pi / 2} \] \(d_i\) random variable corresponding target variable stratum \(s_i\) , \(f_{d_i}\) \(f\) density functions \(d_i\) \(d\), respectively. Additionally, \(\textbf{RelE} \left( f_{d_{}} \mid \mid  f \right)\) relative entropy \(f_{d_i}\) \(f\). \[ \textbf{RelE} \left( f_{d_{}} \mid \mid  f \right) = H \left(f_{d_{}} , f\right) - H \left(f_{d_{}}\right) = \sum_{= 1}^{n} f_{d_{}} \log \frac{1}{f} - \sum_{= 1}^{n} f_{d_{}} \log \frac{1}{f_{d_{}}} = \sum_{= 1}^{n} f_{d_{}} \log \frac{f_{d_{}}}{f} \]

previous_headings: 2. The principle of measuring spatial stratified heterogeneity based on information consistency
what: 2.2 When the dependent variable is a nominal variable:
title: Information Consistency-Based Measures for Spatial Stratified Heterogeneity
text: \[ I_{N}\left(d,s\right) = \frac{\left(d,s\right)}{\left(d\right)} = \frac{\left(d\right) - \left(d \mid s\right)}{\left(d\right)} = 1 - \frac{\sum_{s_i \S}\sum_{x \V_d} p\left(s_i,x\right) \log p\left(x \mid s_i\right)}{\sum_{x \V_d} p\left(x\right) \log p\left(x\right)} \] \(p\left(x\right)\) probability observing \(x\) \(U\), \(p\left(s_i,x\right)\) probability observing \(s_i\) \(x\) \(U\), \(p\left(x \mid s_i\right)\) probability observing \(x\) given stratum \(s_i\).
